document.full_text: american brendan steele held his nerve on an error-free back nine for a one-shot victory over compatriots kevin chappell and charley hoffman to clinch his maiden pga tour title at the texas open on sunday.
document.title: nerves of steele earn rookie victory at texas open
lines_and_colors: american brendan steele held his nerve on an error-free back nine for a one-shot victory over compatriots kevin chappell and charley hoffman to clinch his maiden pga tour title at the texas open on sunday.
